desc: Jewelry that will last a lifetime, guaranteed, and it's lighter than you can believe!

layout.text: High Quality, Lightweight, and Guaranteed. Our Hand-Crafted Jewelry is Created with You in Mind

Our one-of-a-kind earrings are lightweight, comfortable, and made for all-day wear. Each stone is hand-set in our small town studio located in Wapakoneta, Ohio. We understand that jewelry is an investment, so all of our stone and post work comes with a lifetime guarantee.
